Test Case Name: TC01_Verify Contractors Equipment Form ZC 6356 Display_Inland Marine_New Business_R1
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that the Contractors Equipment form ZC 6356 is displayed with correct version and edition date in the Inland Marine LOB for new business submissions
Action: 1. Navigate to Phoenix submission creation screen
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to view the submission creation screen with all required fields

Action: 2. Create a Domestic submission with Inland Marine LOB
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to create a submission successfully and proceed to line selection

Action: 3. Navigate to Inland Marine screen and select Contractors Equipment Coverage
Expected Result: 3. User should be able to view the Inland Marine screen with all mandatory fields displayed

Action: 4. Verify form ZC 6356 is listed in the coverage options
Expected Result: 4. User should verify that form ZC 6356 is available and selectable in the Contractors Equipment coverage options

Action: 5. Verify form edition date is "03/25"
Expected Result: 5. User should verify that the form edition date displays as "03/25" (March 2025 edition)

Action: 6. Verify form version information is correctly displayed
Expected Result: 6. User should verify that form version and edition date are properly displayed with correct metadata

Test Case Name: TC02_Verify Form ZC 6356 Auto-Attachment on Selection_Inland Marine_New Business_R2
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that the Contractors Equipment form ZC 6356 is automatically attached to the document when user selects the coverage
Action: 1. Navigate to Phoenix submission creation screen
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to view the submission creation screen

Action: 2. Create a Domestic submission with Inland Marine LOB
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to create a submission successfully

Action: 3. Navigate to Inland Marine screen and select Contractors Equipment Coverage
Expected Result: 3. User should be able to view the Inland Marine screen

Action: 4. Select form ZC 6356 from coverage options
Expected Result: 4. Form ZC 6356 should be automatically added to the documents section

Action: 5. Navigate to documents section
Expected Result: 5. User should be able to view the documents section with attached forms

Action: 6. Verify that form ZC 6356 is attached with latest version
Expected Result: 6. User should verify that the attached form is the latest 03/25 edition and not the old version

Action: 7. Verify form versioning information
Expected Result: 7. User should verify that form metadata displays correct version and edition date information

Test Case Name: TC03_Verify Form ZC 6356 Latest Edition in Payload_Inland Marine_New Business_R1
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that the latest 03/25 edition form ZC 6356 is sent in the payload to the backend system
Action: 1. Navigate to Phoenix submission creation screen
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to view the submission creation screen

Action: 2. Create a Domestic submission with Inland Marine LOB
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to create a submission successfully

Action: 3. Navigate to Inland Marine screen and select Contractors Equipment Coverage
Expected Result: 3. User should be able to view the Inland Marine screen with all fields

Action: 4. Select form ZC 6356 from coverage options
Expected Result: 4. Form ZC 6356 should be selected

Action: 5. Verify the edition date in system payload is "03/25"
Expected Result: 5. System should send the form with edition date "03/25" in the API payload

Action: 6. Verify form metadata in payload
Expected Result: 6. The payload should include correct form versioning information and metadata

Test Case Name: TC11_Verify Form Edition Date Display_Inland Marine_New Business_R1_R3
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that the Contractors Equipment form ZC 6356 displays the correct edition date of 03/25 and is aligned with August release date

Expected Result: 1. User should be able to view the submission creation screen

Action: 2. Create a Domestic submission with effective date in August or later
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to create a submission with August effective date

Action: 3. Navigate to Inland Marine screen and select Contractors Equipment Coverage
Expected Result: 3. User should be able to view the Inland Marine screen

Action: 4. Select form ZC 6356 from coverage options
Expected Result: 4. Form ZC 6356 should be selected

Action: 5. Verify displayed edition date is "03/25"
Expected Result: 5. The form should display edition date as "03/25" on the UI

Action: 6. Verify edition date in form metadata
Expected Result: 6. The form metadata should confirm edition date is "03/25" (March 2025)

Test Case Name: TC17_Verify Form Effective Date Alignment with August Release_Inland Marine_New Business_R3
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that form ZC 6356 effective date is correctly aligned with the August release date
Action: 1. Navigate to Phoenix submission creation screen
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to view the submission creation screen

Action: 2. Create a Domestic submission with effective date prior to August release
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to create a submission with pre-August effective date

Action: 3. Navigate to Inland Marine screen and select Contractors Equipment Coverage
Expected Result: 3. User should be able to view the Inland Marine screen

Action: 4. Verify form ZC 6356 is not available for selection with pre-August effective date
Expected Result: 4. Form ZC 6356 should not be available for policies with effective date before August

Action: 5. Create another submission with effective date on or after August
Expected Result: 5. User should be able to create a submission with August or later effective date

Action: 6. Navigate to Inland Marine screen and verify form ZC 6356 is available
Expected Result: 6. Form ZC 6356 should be available for policies with August or later effective date
